UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Single amino acid substitutions at specific positions of the heptad repeat sequence of piscidin-1 yielded novel analogs that show low cytotoxicity as well as in vitro and in vivo anti-endotoxin activity.
Literature.Author: Kumar A, Tripathi AK, Kathuria M, Shree S, Tripathi JK, Purshottam RK, Ramachandran R, Mitra K, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5.0±0.7µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=20±2.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.5±0.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=18±2.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-427(MIC=12.0±1.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC=6.0±0.8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=8.0±1.1µM)
